meanings.definition: To edit excessively or too much.
meanings.sent1: She always overedits her essays until they lose their original meaning.
meanings.sent2: He tends to overedits his photos, removing all the natural beauty.
meanings.sent3: After she overedits her work, it looks like a completely different piece!
meanings.sent4: His tendency to overedits his writing turns it into a jumbled mess.
meanings.sent5: The author's habit of overedits makes her stories lose their charm.

meanings.definition: To make too many changes during the editing process.
meanings.sent1: They often overedits their videos, adding unnecessary effects.
meanings.sent2: The writer tends to overedits his articles, confusing the readers.
meanings.sent3: When he overedits, it's like he's trying to rewrite the entire piece!
meanings.sent4: Her constant overedits turn the project into a never-ending task.
meanings.sent5: The team's habit of overedits delays the completion of the project.
